attributes.action: Bestow the title of Dame upon Ms Joanna Lumley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ms Joanna Lumley has campaigned for the rights of Ghurka soldiers to residency in the UK. Whilst using her celebrity to draw attention to the issue, she has taken the lead in petitioning for their automatic right to remain in the country after they leave the Army. I propose that Ms Lumley be honoured Dame,for her tireless work in championing the rights of these brave, loyal troops.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
